definitions.body: leg, (NH [[כֶּרַע]], Aram. [[כַּרְעָא]], kar9o0—only dual fem. [[כְּרָעַיִם]] Le 11:21 + 3 t.; [[כְּרָעָָיִם]] Le 9:14; sf [[כְּרָעָיו]] Ex 12:9 + 3 t.;—two (bending) legs, of animals in ritual phrase of P, [[ראׁשׁוֹ עַל־כְּרָעָיו]] Ex 12:9 his head with his legs, Le 4:11; ([[יו]])[[כרע ]]([[ה]])[[ו]] ([[ו]])[[קרב]]([[ה]]) (his) inwards and (his) legs Ex 29:17, Le 1:9, Le 1:13, Le 8:21, Le 9:14; Am 3:12 (of legs of lamb in mouth of lion); of the long bending hinder legs of the Saltatorial Orthoptera (v. Tristr:Nat. Hist. Bib. 309; Dr:Joe 84) Le 11:21 [[אשׁר לוֹ כְרָעַיִם מִמַּעַל לְרַגְלָיו לְנַתֵּר בָּהֵן עַל הָאָרֶץ]] which have bending legs above their feet, etc.
